about_the_game:
Evil Sinister: Introduction


In Evil Sinister you are an independent journalist thrust into the heart of darkness as you lead a daring investigation into an infamous abandoned house.
Whispers of malevolent forces and chilling disturbances have plagued the neighboring community, beckoning you to uncover the truth behind the sinister secrets lurking within.

Feel the fear


Armed with only your determination and a flickering flashlight, you embark on a harrowing journey into the depths of the abandoned abode. Every creaking floorboard and ominous shadow sends a shiver down your spine as you navigate the foreboding halls, piecing together the fragmented remnants of the house's grim history.

But beware, for you are not alone in your pursuit of the truth. Sinister entities and otherworldly apparitions haunt the corridors, determined to thwart your progress and drive you to the brink of madness. As you delve deeper into the darkness, the line between reality and nightmare begins to blur, and you must rely on your keen investigative skills to survive the onslaught of supernatural horrors.

Find the thruth


Evil Sinister is a pulse-pounding psychological horror game, that will test your courage and resilience in the face of unspeakable evil. Will you uncover the chilling secrets of the abandoned house, or will you become just another victim of its malevolent grasp?
The answers lie within, waiting to be discovered by those brave enough to confront the darkness head-on.

content_descriptors.notes: There is some blood and horrific visuals.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX SERIES, 2000' and + / AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3080 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
